metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29913 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The parent process would not properly check whether the Speech Synthesis feature is enabled, when receiving instructions from a child process. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.9.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-29913` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

thunderbird - 1:91.9.1+build1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:91.9.1+build1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:91.9.1+build1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:91.9.1+build1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:91.9.1+build1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:91.9.1+build1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:91.9.1+build1-0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
